Sunday. Media reports during Egypt's political unrest had quoted Zahi Hawass as saying that looters damaged two mummies, but in a BBC interview on Sunday he said that this was not the case. They were not mummies, there were two skulls taken outside from the CT scan machine. Everything will go back to normal at Cairo Museum today, said Zahi Hawass , head of Egypt's antiquities authority since 2002. He was made a cabinet minister last week. Saying his`` heart was in Indiana,'' Mike Pence said he would continue to meet with the good and strong and opinionated people of this state before deciding his next move. During a question-and-answer session, Mike Pence said his proudest moment as a congressman came when he helped a Muncie mother avoid deportation to her home country of Sierra Leone.
